item.description:
Language Patterns - Discovering the Meta Model

Language is an extremely important part of NLP, hence the Linguistic part of Neuro Linguistic Programming.
Language patterns are used everywhere - sales, debates, political speeches, therapy, and even parenting. Language, by itself, can create change in someone's mind.

We will examine the Meta Model but also talk about the other models.

Be prepared to become much more aware of how you language affects others and yourself. Also you will now become aware of how others are using their language.

Warning, you may never be able to look the same at a used car salesmen. wink

Come and communicate!

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: GB Neuro Linguistic Programming Meetup - Methuen - What are you talking about?
